span.p: West Lyon Community School has been approved to provide no cost breakfasts and lunches to all children ages 1 to 18 during the current school closure. Our Grab-N-Go program is available for pick up on Mondays and Wednesdays between the hours of 11:30 am and 12:30 pm. Children will receive two days of packaged breakfasts and lunches on Monday and three days of meals on Wednesday. If you would like to begin to receive meals through our Grab-N-Go program, and you have not previously completed our registration form, please do so at :

span.span: West Lyon Community School ha sido aprobada para proporcionar desayunos y almuerzos sin costo a todos los niños de 1 a 18 años durante el cierre actual de la escuela. Nuestro programa Grab-N-Go está disponible para recoger los lunes y miércoles entre las 11:30 a.m. y las 12:30 p.m. Los niños recibirán dos días de desayunos y almuerzos envasados ​​el lunes y tres días de comidas el miércoles. Si desea comenzar a recibir comidas a través de nuestro programa Grab-N-Go, y no ha completado previamente nuestro formulario de registro, hágalo en:
West Lyon es un proveedor de igualdad de oportunidades

span.p: West Lyon is an Equal Opportunity Provider
